originContent: The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.
translatedContent: 有關執行 **a-interact** 的詳細資訊請參見 `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`；而 **c-interact** 的說明則在 `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`。

originContent: 🚀 We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set!
translatedContent: 🚀 我們很高興宣布推出 **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** 資料集！

originContent: It's a tough one — the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions.
translatedContent: 這是一個高難度挑戰 —— 目前最佳的大型語言模型僅達到 **16.33%** 的成功率，在 `c-interact` 和 `a-interact` 部分僅有 **10.0%**。

originContent: 👉 For more details, please visit our [project website](https://bird-interact.github.io/).
translatedContent: 👉 更多細節，請造訪我們的 [專案網站](https://bird-interact.github.io/)。

originContent: 📬 We'll be sending the **Ground Truth & Test cases** to our mailing list this week.
translatedContent: 📬 本週我們會將 **標準答案與測試案例** 發送給郵件訂閱名單。

originContent: If you want early access, please send an email as instructed on the site for an **automatic download**.
translatedContent: 若您希望搶先取得，請依網站指示發送電子郵件以獲取 **自動下載**。

originContent: 💾 On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research.
translatedContent: 💾 另外，我們也發佈了 **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** 的 SQLite 版本，方便本地研究。

originContent: The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon!
translatedContent: 完整版 **LiveSQLBench-Base** 及 **-Large** 即將推出！
- [ ] SFT / RL 使用者模擬器
